alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 10:04PM CDT until July 21 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Clarke County in east central Mississippi... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1004 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rose Hill to near Middleton, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Rose Hill around 1010 PM CDT. Orange around 1015 PM CDT. Quitman and Crandall around 1025 PM CDT. Paulding, De Soto and Barnett around 1035 PM CDT. Stafford Springs around 1050 PM CDT. Heidelberg around 1055 PM CDT. Vernon and Moss around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Pachuta, Montrose, Shubuta and Louin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
